EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quote on Dental Implant Fees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting ClearChoice Dental Implant Centers, America’s #1 choice for dental implants.
We hope to have an opportunity to serve you and understand you have a question about pricing. Because every dental condition is different, this is a question that’s impossible to specifically answer without a doctor’s consult.
Costs follow proper treatment plans, which are influenced by:
• How many teeth are loose or missing?
• What area of the mouth are these missing or failing teeth located?
• What is the condition of the bone?
• What is the condition of the soft tissue?
• What is the condition of the remaining teeth?
It is for these reasons that only the doctor can put fees in writing, and only after studying your complimentary x-ray and preparing a definitive treatment plan.
Please call me today at 1-888-654-4675, and I’ll set you up for a Free, No-Risk Consultation and 3D CAT scan (a $700 value).
Sincerely,
{!Lead.Call_Center_Agent__c} Dental Implant Consultant ClearChoice Dental Center
ClearChoice Dental Implant Centers are locally owned and operated by licensed local dentists, and are part of a professional affiliation of implant practices operated by oral surgeons, prosthodontists and restorative dentists across the U.S. *Qualified patients can have their procedure in one day after initial workup without additional bone graft surgery. Results may vary in individual cases.
